description: They are very happy to introduce their first seamless products. Knitted in Italy with the experts within the field of technical base-layers. It is designed with a 'sweat map' so that you will have ventilation where needed on the garment, during high-intensity workouts. The polypropylene next to skin, helps transport moisture from the body out of the garment. Wear the pant with the matching Racer zip-up or crewneck for training or skiing.
name: We Norwegians Racer Pants - Mens
